name: Blocky Survival Game
description:
You are in a random world, where you have to survive from zombies... Create Shelters or Base. So, that zombies don't attack you... You have a Pickaxe and a Sword for your defence... You can even Craft a Gun from crafting recipe ... Gun can be used for your defence and for breaking blocks from far away... 

So, Thats it Install and Play!!!!

Hope you enjoy....!!!

The controls are simple

•  W to Move Forward

•  A to Move Left

•  D to Move Right

•  S to Move Backward

•  E to open Crafting recipe

•  Right Click to Place Blocks

•  Left Click to Break Blocks

•  Space Bar to Jump

•  1-7 numbers to  Select a hotbar item

*Note:  Hotbar is   the place where collected blocks or items are  shown

Features

•  keyboard/mouse support

•  Support Windows  7/8/10/11

•  Singleplayer

Download Instructions

•  Download the file

•  Unzip it

•  Open the file and Search for 'Main Game Icon'

•  Create its shortcut on the desktop for easy access

•  Open it

•  Enjoy...
